verbose_text: We show that NFIB promotes metastasis not only by increasing the local dissemination of the tumor cells within the lung but also by altering their metastatic profile, permitting colonization of a wider set of tissues.
evidence: NFIB promotes metastasis not only by increasing the local dissemination of the tumor cells within the lung but also by altering their metastatic profile, permitting colonization of a wider set
